Welcome to Grand Buffet of North Charleston Welcome to Grand Buffet of North Charleston Welcome to Grand Buffet of North Charleston Chinese • Seafood • Sushi • Hibachi • American | Eat-in • Take out Call for details/reservations (843) 746-9978 Connect With Us About GRAND BUFFET 
Our Cuisine
Our cuisine is a fusion of traditional and modern flavors, with a focus on using fresh and locally sourced ingredients. We pride ourselves on our handcrafted dishes, made with care and attention to detail. Our menu offers a variety of options, from classic comfort foods to innovative creations. 
Our Events
We love hosting events and celebrations at GRAND BUFFET (North Charleston). From birthdays to weddings, our restaurant is the perfect venue for any occasion. We offer customized menus and can accommodate groups of all sizes. Our team is dedicated to making your event a memorable one. All You Can Eat Buffet Price List
